articles.description: Reaction to Everton 2-0 Liverpool; Wednesday's Premier League games, plus build-up to Thursday's match between Brighton and Manchester City.
articles.title: Reaction: Liverpool title race blow in Everton loss & latest football news

articles.description: Tyler Herro scores 24 points as the Miami Heat stun the top-seeded Boston Celtics to level their Eastern Conference play-off duel.
articles.title: 2024 NBA play-offs: Miami Heat stun top seeds Boston Celtics

articles.description: Everton ended a cycle of icy misery by applying the final blow to Liverpool's Premier League title hopes, writes Phil McNulty.
articles.title: Everton 2-0 Liverpool: Everton apply final blow to Liverpool title challenge'

articles.description: Liverpool captain Virgil van Dijk questions his side's desire to win the Premier League after a damaging defeat against Merseyside rivals Everton.
articles.title: Everton 2-0 Liverpool: Virgil van Dijk questions team's desire

articles.description: Manchester United have to come from behind twice to beat bottom-of-the-table Sheffield United at Old Trafford.
articles.title: Man Utd fight back twice to beat Sheff Utd late on

articles.description: Xavi will remain as Barcelona coach until at least June 2025 after changing his mind about leaving at the end of the season.
articles.title: Xavi to remain as Barcelona manager until at least June 2025

articles.description: The inside story of how Tom Brady and Brock Purdy came to be picked so late in the draft, becoming two of the biggest steals in NFL history.
articles.title: NFL draft 2024: Tom Brady & Brock Purdy - inside two of the NFL's biggest draft steals

articles.description: Ousmane Dembele and Kylian Mbappe both score twice as Paris St-Germain move closer to the Ligue 1 title.
articles.title: Mbappe and Dembele star as PSG edge closer to title

articles.description: England have big decisions to make as they prepare to name their squad for the T20 World Cup, says Stephan Shemilt.
articles.title: Men's T20 World Cup: England prepare to name squad

articles.description: Liverpool captain Virgil van Dijk says prospective new Reds manager Arne Slot's playing philosophy could be suited to the Anfield club.
articles.title: Liverpool: Virgil van Dijk says Arne Slot could be suited to replacing Jurgen Klopp
